<h4>Top Highest Grossing Tamil (Kollywood) Movies of All Time Worldwide by Box Office Collection List</h4>

                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>
                                        </p>

                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>

		<p>

                                        </p>
<h4>Top Highest Grossing Tamil (Kollywood) Movies of All Time Worldwide by Box Office Collection List</h4>
<p>Here is the list of highest-grossing Top Tamil (Kollywood) Movies <span style="background-color: white;">of All Time </span>
                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>

<h4>Top Highest Grossing Tamil (Kollywood) Movies of All Time Worldwide by Box Office Collection List</h4>
<p>Here is the list of highest-grossing Top Tamil (Kollywood) Movies <span style="background-color: white;">of All Time </span>
                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>
                                        </p>
                                        <div class="bolly-content-middle_2" id="bolly-273516795">
                                            <script async="" crossorigin="anonymous" src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=ca-pub-3709735971209224">
                                            </script>
                                            <ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-3709735971209224" data-ad-format="auto" data-ad-slot="4831445154" style="display:block;">
                                            </ins>
<script> 
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); 
</script>
</div>
<h4>
                                            <b>All Time Highest Grossing Tamil Movies by Worldwide Box Office  Collection</b>
                                        </h4>
<table>
<tbody>
<tr>
<th>
<h4>Movie Name</h4>
</th>
<th>
<h4>Worldwide Box Office Collection Gross</h4>
</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
                                                        <b>1. 2.0 ( Hindi+Tamil+ Telugu+China) </b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <b>656 Crore</b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <img border="0" decoding="async" height="120" loading="lazy" src="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2.0_film_poster.jpg" width="100">
                                                        </img>
                                                    </td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
                                                        <b>2. <a href="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/2023/08/jailer-movie-review.html">Jailer</a>
                                                        </b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <b>605 Crore</b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <img border="0" decoding="async" height="120" loading="lazy" src="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Jailer-Box-Office-Collection-1.jpg" width="100">
                                                        </img>
                                                    </td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
                                                        <b>3. <a href="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/2022/09/ponniyin-selvan-1-ps1-movie-review.html">PS1</a>
                                                        </b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <b>498.8 Crore</b>
                                                    </td>

<h4>Top Highest Grossing Tamil (Kollywood) Movies of All Time Worldwide by Box Office Collection List</h4>

                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>
                                        </p>

                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>

		<p>

                                        </p>
<h4>Top Highest Grossing Tamil (Kollywood) Movies of All Time Worldwide by Box Office Collection List</h4>
<p>Here is the list of highest-grossing Top Tamil (Kollywood) Movies <span style="background-color: white;">of All Time </span>
                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>

<h4>Top Highest Grossing Tamil (Kollywood) Movies of All Time Worldwide by Box Office Collection List</h4>
<p>Here is the list of highest-grossing Top Tamil (Kollywood) Movies <span style="background-color: white;">of All Time </span>
                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>
                                        </p>
                                        <div class="bolly-content-middle_2" id="bolly-273516795">
                                            <script async="" crossorigin="anonymous" src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=ca-pub-3709735971209224">
                                            </script>
                                            <ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-3709735971209224" data-ad-format="auto" data-ad-slot="4831445154" style="display:block;">
                                            </ins>
<script> 
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); 
</script>
</div>
<h4>
                                            <b>All Time Highest Grossing Tamil Movies by Worldwide Box Office  Collection</b>
                                        </h4>
<table>
<tbody>
<tr>
<th>
<h4>Movie Name</h4>
</th>
<th>
<h4>Worldwide Box Office Collection Gross</h4>
</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
                                                        <b>1. 2.0 ( Hindi+Tamil+ Telugu+China) </b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <b>656 Crore</b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <img border="0" decoding="async" height="120" loading="lazy" src="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2.0_film_poster.jpg" width="100">
                                                        </img>
                                                    </td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
                                                        <b>2. <a href="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/2023/08/jailer-movie-review.html">Jailer</a>
                                                        </b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <b>605 Crore</b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <img border="0" decoding="async" height="120" loading="lazy" src="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Jailer-Box-Office-Collection-1.jpg" width="100">
                                                        </img>
                                                    </td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
                                                        <b>3. <a href="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/2022/09/ponniyin-selvan-1-ps1-movie-review.html">PS1</a>
                                                        </b>
                                                    </td>
<td>
                                                        <b>498.8 Crore</b>
                                                    </td>

<h4>Top Highest Grossing Tamil (Kollywood) Movies of All Time Worldwide by Box Office Collection List</h4>

                                            <span style="background-color: white;">by Box Office collection worldwide by gross collections it includes India and overseas collections. This list only contains Tamil movies. Here is the complete list first by worldwide collections and below by collections inside Tamil Nadu</span>
                                        </p>

<article class="post-31964 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-box-office" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">

	<meta content="https://www.bollymoviereviewz.com/2022/06/top-highest-grossing-tamil-kollywood-movies-of-all-time-worldwide-by-box-office-collection-list.html" itemType="https://schema.org/WebPage" itemprop="mainEntityOfPage" itemscope="">
                                    </meta>
		<meta content="Top Highest Grossing Tamil (Kollywood) Movies of All Time Worldwide by Box Office Collection List" itemprop="headline">
